attributes.action: make the playing of the Rocky theme tune obligatary at weddings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Join the campaign to make it compulsory for the Rocky theme tune to be played as the Bride and Groom walk out of church/mosque/synagogue/registrar office.

Running up a flight of steps after is optional

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
